item.title: Call For Paper
item.description: DevFest Toulouse will take place on October 3rd, 2019 at Pierre Baudis congress center. Our fourth edition will gather 1000 attendees! While waiting for the D-day do not hesitate to propose a talk at DevFest Toulouse CFP. It is now open and this year it will be for 2 months only (from March the 25th to Mai the 25th.) Be aware that at mid terms, we will select our ‚Äúearly speakers‚Äù, so do not wait till the end!

item.title: Get ready for DevFest Toulouse 2019!
item.description: Today it is with great pleasure that we announce you that the 4th edition of DevFest Toulouse will take place October 3rd 2019 at the center of congress Pierre Baudis. As last year, the event will be right in the city center, in the Compans Cafarelli neighborhood. The center of congress Pierre Baudis is accessible by the subway, bus or even by car. This year we will have more space, more sponsors and more attendees

item.title: [Contest] Find out when is the 2019 edition taking place
item.description: Today we released the following tweet: We created this contest to engage our community and it did not take long (around 20 minutes) until we got a winner üò±! If you got stuck, here is the solution: Solution Download the file Recognize that it is a JWT otken and decode it with http://jwt.io for example Extract the data field, whch is in base64, and decode it with an online tool or base64 -d .

Amal Wilson Varghese hails from Wayanad, Kerala. He majored in Molecular biology from University of Mysore and is currently pursuing PhD at Division of molecular medicine, SCTIMST. He is driven by his passion towards biology and looks for ways to improve the existence of an organism. His area of interest includes molecular biology, neurobiology, and therapeutics.

Arun Mitra is a PhD Scholar at Achutha Menon Centre for Health Science Studies, Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology, Trivandrum. He has a background in Public Health with an MD in Community Medicine from Maharashtra University of Health Sciences, Nashik. His current area of research is focused on health data science with domain expertise in public health. He is currently looking at how data science can contribute to transforming routine health data into evidence for public health decision-making as part of his research work.

Arun V S, is a student of Diploma in Operation Theatre and Anesthesia Technology at SCTIMST. He has completed his diploma in Electronics Engineering in 2020. He is a native of Trivandrum and indulges in sports like football and cricket. He is an enthusiastic information seeker and strongly believes in energy, passion and dedication towards his work.

Dr. Ashis, a medical doctor who graduated from Trivandrum Medical college, has a post-graduation in Community Medicine from KEM, Mumbai. After a one-year stint in ICMR-Delhi as medical scientist, he joined Achutha menon center as a Research Officer in the institute’s HTA unit. While he is pursuing a Doctorate in health economics, he is also keen on health policy and equity in medicine. He was a fellow in the IHSC-NITI Aayog Mentor-Mentee Program and has won accolades in national level poster presentation and essay writing competitions.

Born and brought up in Trivandrum, Kerala. She graduated MBBS from KUHS university in 2017 and has worked under renowned doctors of surgical gastroenterology, KIMS, Trivandrum. She nurtures a passion in public health and is currently pursuing Masters in Public Health in AMCHSS, SCTIMST. She is an accomplished athlete having achievements in sports such as Kho Kho, Badminton and Tracks. She loves upcycled crafting, gardening and is an adept cook. Loves pushing beyond her limits, conquering new challenges, and looking forward to a brighter future.

Athira K R is currently pursuing her PhD in the Division of thrombosis Research unit SCTIMST. She has many feathers in her cap including: BSc. Chemistry from Union Christian College, Aluva, MSc. Biopolymer Science from CIPET, Kochi and an MPhil. Biomedical Technology ‚Äì SCTIMST, Trivandrum. She has been an active NCC Cadet and has had an enriching experience through her various stints which have equipped her with wide knowledge and many skills

Athira M. is a post graduate in Chemistry and pursuing her Ph.D.in 3D Printing of Polymeric Biomaterials in the Division of Polymeric Medical Devices, BMT Wing, SCTIMST. She enjoys dancing and loves to belt out tunes through her singing and lovely voice. She has a zeal for reading and believes in enjoying the simple things in life

Ayurveda graduate from Maharashtra, currently MPH batch 2022 student. An avid listener of her friends, loves capturing moments through her photography. She believes in always trying to make a difference in her own small ways, happily backpacking through different states as well as life itself! Has a love for music, handicrafts and can put her own twist to conjuring up amazing stuff- always willing to learn more!

A traveller and foodie by passion and a doctor by profession, Dr Deepanjan joined DM Cardiology at SCTIMST in January 2020 after completing his MD at PGIMER Chandigarh. Although he is known for his brilliant academic track record with numerous awards and Gold Medals, along with over 100 publications and presentations, very few are aware of his multiple hobbies including swimming, cooking, art and music, and his awards of Mr Rhapsody in 2010 (MCK) and Mr Zenith in 2019 (PGIMER)

Dr George, a MBBS graduate currently pursuing Masters in Public Health at AMCHSS. He is an avid quizzer, a passionate history buff who loves to indulge in nonfiction literature and loves travelling to locations where history sleeps. He is a footballer and keenly follows EPL.
Dr Gokul G Pillai an MBBS graduate and a public health aspirant currently pursuing Mater of Public Health in Achutha Menon Centre for Health Science Studies ‚Äì SCTIMST Trivandrum.

A dentist by profession, Punjabi kudi at heart. Currently pursuing her Masters in Public health at SCTIMST. Likes to Dabbles with firing up other’s tastebuds with her cooking and is a hardcore connoisseur. Loves all things - “fashion” to “fitness” and has a must-hear collection of music in her Spotify! ‚ÄúTo summarize my magnanimous life in a sentence would just be pure embarrassment‚Äù

K. Jishnu Pawan, is a Researcher, currently pursuing Doctoral Degree in Health Sciences at SCTIMST, has completed his undergraduate in BSc (Nursing), a Postgraduate in Social Work and is a Doctoral Student of Philosophy in Public Health. This background has equipped him with enhanced knowledge in the area of empowerment and resilience thinking. His skills have allowed him to dabble between various roles: as an educator, an entrepreneur, a counselor, a manager and a public speaker.

An Occupational therapist with lots of charm and fun on her mind. She believes in empathy and reaching out to the needy, having worked with autistic kids and those suffering from cerebral palsy, it reignited her passion for community work and public health. That brought her to pursuing MPH at SCTIMST. A constant caring friend with a penchant for classical dance and embodying skills in dance form: Kathak. She is amazing with a badminton racquet, Bball and great at teaching her friends before exams!

Dr. Markose L Paret is a Senior Resident in DM Cardiac Anaesthesiology program. He is currently on study leave from Armed Forces Medical Services. He really enjoys football, loves to tune in to different genres of music and can get lost in non-fiction books hoping to widen his horizons. “Hope to catch you all at SCAAF PRAGATI 2022”

Medha Surendranath is a PhD student at Biomedical Technology Wing of SCTIMST. She is a post graduate in chemistry, currently doing research in the development of polymeric materials for biomedical applications. Loves to dance and has great oration skills.

Dr Mehrunnisa, a Dental graduate currently pursuing Masters in Public Health at AMCHHS, SCTIMST. Self-certified bookworm. Aspiring poet and author. Die hard BTS fan/ARMY On a mission to befriend every kindred soul with the same love for the band. An absolute sucker for all things cute and furry. Prefers if life slowed down and allowed us to marvel at the beauty of simple things. “Let‚Äôs meet at Pragati 2022!”

A Trivian who graduated in BSc. Nursing from KUHS university in 2019. Currently pursuing diploma in CVT nursing in SCTIMST. He is a freelance photographer and videographer who is peculiar in capturing nature and urban styles. A voyager who loves to travel a lot and an automobile enthusiast.

Sarah Lukhose is pursuing Ph.D. in the Department of Medical Devices Engineering, Biomedical Technology Wing, SCTIMST, and a recipient of the University Grants Commission’s Senior Research Fellowship. She is currently involved in researching several polymeric composite biomaterials that can be used for biomedical applications. She has completed her master’s and bachelor’s degree in Biochemistry from SB College, Changanassery, under Mahatma Gandhi University, and from SNGC, Coimbatore, under Bharathiar University, respectively. She loves to explore the beauty of nature and enjoys capturing them through her vivid photography

Dr Shivanand Kumatagi from Department of Transfusion Medicine. He is a certified MBBS doctor currently pursuing his MD. He is an avid football and hockey player who also follows cricket closely. He is an Instagram lover. Enjoys participating in co-curricular and extracurricular activities. ‚ÄúLet’s all take a bit of our busy schedule and entertain ourselves in this extravaganza fest.‚Äù

Dr. S.S Lal (Sadasivan Sreemathy Lal) is a leading intellectual from India who has played a seminal role in transforming Public Health internationally. Starting from a humble background, Dr. Lal has shown the way of how any dedicated individual could rise to the international stage and make huge impacts on social service delivery. His focus was on ensuring the highest quality care delivery in a very limited resource setting. During his stint in East Timor, and later through program implementation in Ethiopia, Zambia, Vietnam, and Bangladesh, he applied his hands-on learning to get things done.

A dentist turned public health professional. Dr George worked with National and International agencies before joining for PhD in Achutha Menon Centre for Health Science Studies, SCTIMST. His PhD broadly focuses on migration and health. He enjoys sports, loves to travel and has a keen interest in Data visualization.

A student, pursuing PG Diploma in Neurotechnology at SCTIMST. She has done her under graduation in BSc. Chemistry from Mother Theresa college Nellikad. Believes in leading a simple life and is active on social media. She is a passionate dancer who has enthralled audiences through different stage performances including Kalothsavam.

item.title: "Num√©rique et environnement" ou "On aurait pu sauver les abeilles, on a pr√©f√©r√© sortir un nouvel iPhone"
item.description: Le num√©rique fait-il partie du probl√®me ou de la solution quand on parle de r√©chauffement climatique ? 5 milliards de smartphones en circulation en 2020, √ßa repr√©sente quoi en consommation √©nerg√©tique, en gaz √† effet de serre, en pollution chimique ? Le streaming illimit√© √† 10 euros par mois c’est le pied mais aujourd’hui Netflix a √† peu pr√®s l’empreinte carbone du plus gros cimentier mondial, qui va payer la facture environnementale ?

item.title: 10 est une puissance de 2
item.description: Le code barre est une invention qui a radicalement modifi√© nos soci√©t√©s. Sans elle, pas d’inventaire efficace, de supermarch√©s ou de vente en ligne. Mais comment coder les chiffres de fa√ßon fiable avec des petites barres noires et blanches ? Quand les contraintes mat√©rielles emp√™chent d’utiliser le binaire, l’ing√©niosit√© et un peu de chance ont permis de cr√©er ce produit, maintenant pr√©sent partout. Nous d√©couvrirons les d√©tails de ce codage, et comment il pourrait m√™me contenir davantage d’informations.

item.title: 3 techniques faciles de manipulation
item.description: Qui ne s‚Äôest jamais fait manipuler ? √âvidemment, on est tous all√© √† une soir√©e alors qu‚Äôon en avait pas envie, on a tous achet√© un truc sans en avoir besoin et on a tous √©t√© influenc√© par nos proches. L‚Äôid√©e de cette pr√©sentation est de vous ouvrir les yeux sur les relations et les influences entre les gens. Je vous exposerai les m√©canismes de prise de d√©cision au travers de 3 techniques simples de manipulation.

item.title: A Kotlin multiplatform evolution
item.description: Have you heard of the code-sharing feature in Kotlin, accompanied with “Write once, run everywhere” slogan? Among its users not only libraries and frameworks authors; there are some projects which have already adopted multiplatform for production. Their applications, written in Kotlin for both iOS and Android, are published in stores. With this talk, you’ll get a brief overview of the evolution of multiplatform technology in Kotlin, concerning the tasks it’s evolved to solve.

item.title: A la d√©couverte de la r√©alit√© augment√©e avec ARCore
item.description: Avec les annonces de l’arriv√©e de la r√©alit√© augment√©e (ou RA) dans Google Maps et Google Search sur Android lors de Google IO 2019, nous constatons que la RA va prendre une place de plus en plus importante dans notre quotidien. La sortie d’ARCore en mars 2018 sur Android a simplifi√© le d√©veloppement d‚Äôapplication en RA sur Android. Au cours de cette session, nous vous proposons de d√©couvrir ARCore, via l‚Äôutilisation dans un navigateur, des applications natives ou des moteurs 3D comme Unity ainsi que les CloudAnchors qui permettent la persistance et le partage de positions d‚Äôobjets dans les sc√®nes de r√©alit√© augment√©e, y compris avec des utilisateurs d‚ÄôiOS.

item.title: Accueil, Th√©, Caf√© et Chocolatines
item.description: Accueil, Th√©, Caf√© et Chocolatines

item.title: Airbus
item.description: Airbus is an international pioneer in the aerospace industry and a leader in designing, manufacturing and delivering aerospace products, services and solutions to customers on a global scale. We believe that it‚Äôs not just what we make, but how we make it that counts; promoting responsible, sustainable and inclusive business practices and acting with integrity. Our people work with passion and determination to make the world a more connected, safer and smarter place, on the ground, in the sky and in space.

item.title: Allo Paris, ici San Francisco. Et si on codait ensemble avec VS Code?
item.description: Vous aimez VS Code car il est simple, intuitif et qu’il fait ce que vous lui demandez. Mais saviez-vous que vous pouviez coder √† plusieurs dans VS Code? et m√™me permettre √† une personne tierce de jouer avec votre d√©bugger depuis l’autre bout du monde? Saviez-vous que vous pouviez avoir un client slack dans VS Code, et m√™me un chat audio? Et avez-vous explor√© toutes les possibilit√©s que VS Code offre quand vous utilisez GitHub?

item.title: Applications de Brainfuck, langage minimaliste mais Turing-complet
item.description: Brainfuck est probablement le plus connu des langages de programmation √©sot√©riques. Ses 8 instructions en font un langage Turing-complet avec lequel il est th√©oriquement possible d‚Äô√©crire n‚Äôimporte quel programme. Et en pratique ? Apr√®s une explication du langage (avec 8 instructions c‚Äôest rapide !) on verra comment j‚Äôai utilis√© Brainfuck pour les qualifications au concours d‚Äôinformatique Prologin, sur un probl√®me de parcours de graphes !

item.title: APSIDE
item.description: APSIDE est une soci√©t√© de conseil en ing√©nierie qui accompagne tous les acteurs de l’√©cosyst√®me IT sur leurs projets innovants. Tous nos ing√©nieurs ont leur sp√©cialit√© : JAVA, JS, BDD, C#, PHP, C++ … Nous s√©lectionnons rigoureusement les projets sur lesquels peuvent intervenir nos ing√©nieurs : caract√®re innovant, phase d’architecture, produits complets, sujets porteurs et utiles… C’est ce qui rend totalement satisfaits de leur mission plus de 96% de nos ing√©nieurs.

item.title: Authentication/Authorization Starters Battle
item.description: When you start a brand new app or service, you need to think about how you will manage authentication and permissions. But if you are like everyone else, you genuinely do not want to actually think about this. If someone else could do that for you, life would be great. And this has actually happened, you have the choice between several boilerplate projects or authentication/authorization libraries. In fact, you have a lot of options.

item.title: AXILEO
item.description: AXILEO est sp√©cialis√©e dans l’innovation et la transformation digitale des entreprises. La soci√©t√© se distingue par un management innovant, sur le mod√®le de l’entreprise lib√©r√©e, o√π les salari√©s participent et d√©finissent la strat√©gie de l’entreprise.

item.title: Berger Levrault
item.description: Berger-Levrault, √©diteur de logiciel international et multisectoriel, accompagne les professionnels priv√©s et publics √† r√©pondre aux exigences croissantes de performance dans leurs m√©tiers et les citoyens dans leur vie quotidienne. Le Groupe adresse les secteurs suivants : Secteur public local; Social et m√©dico-social; Sanitaire; Entreprises et industrie; √âducation. Pour l‚Äôensemble de ses secteurs d‚Äôactivit√©, Berger-Levrault a d√©velopp√© une gamme de logiciels et de services adapt√©e aux besoins sp√©cifiques de chaque m√©tier.

item.title: Brace yourself, üç¶Vanilla is coming ‚Ä¶ back üï∂!
item.description: Dans un monde de saveurs complexes et sophistiqu√©es, la guerre du toping fait rage chez les cr√®mes glac√©es du Web ! Face au champs de b√©tail, les pronostiques vont bon train pour savoir qui l‚Äôemportera entre le crunchy Angulaire, le fondant Reactif et le d√©coratif Vue. Durant ce temps, loin de ces vicissitudes, la petite saveur basique vanille fait son bonhomme de chemin. S‚Äôagirait-il du h√©ros de la l√©gende, susceptible de renverser le destin de ce monde sans heurt ?

item.title: Capgemini
item.description: Capgemini est un leader mondial du conseil, des services informatiques et de la transformation num√©rique. A la pointe de l‚Äôinnovation, le Groupe aide ses clients √† saisir l‚Äôensemble des opportunit√©s que pr√©sentent le cloud, le digital et les plateformes. Fort de 50 ans d‚Äôexp√©rience et d‚Äôune grande expertise des diff√©rents secteurs d‚Äôactivit√©, il accompagne les entreprises et organisations dans la r√©alisation de leurs ambitions, de la d√©finition de leur strat√©gie √† la mise en ≈ìuvre de leurs op√©rations.

item.title: Cenareo
item.description: Cenareo, previously CityMeo, is a real ‚ÄúFrench Tech‚Äù success story. Located in Lab√®ge within the IoT Valley, we develop a best-in-class digital signage CMS (SaaS mode) to create, manage and broadcast content on remote displays in real-time, from any PC, tablet or smartphone. Created by 4 engineers, Cenareo has experienced exponential growth and rapid development since its inception in 2012, posting triple-digit growth and now counting upwards of 30 employees. The company has ambitious targets and a Global outlook.

item.title: Cirruseo part of Accenture
item.description: Cr√©√© en 2011, Cirruseo est l‚Äôun des principaux partenaires de Google Cloud en France et l‚Äôun des plus importants acteurs fran√ßais sp√©cialis√©s exclusivement dans les services Google Cloud. Cirruseo accompagne ses clients dans leur transformation num√©rique, de l‚Äôexp√©rience collaborateur autour des solutions Chrome et G Suite, √† celle des m√©tiers avec les services de Google Cloud Platform. Les solutions digitales de Cirruseo sont mobiles, int√®grent la Data et l‚ÄôAnalytics by design, et sont con√ßues pour et par le Cloud.

item.title: CNES
item.description: Le CNES propose aux pouvoirs publics la politique spatiale de la France et la met en oeuvre dans 5 grands domaines strat√©giques : Ariane, les Sciences, l‚ÄôObservation, les T√©l√©communications et la D√©fense.

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: 1. Purpose A primary goal of GDG Toulouse is to be inclusive to the largest number of contributors, with the most varied and diverse backgrounds possible. As such, we are committed to providing a friendly, safe and welcoming environment for all, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, ability, ethnicity, socioeconomic status, and religion (or lack thereof). GDG Toulouse prides itself on being an open, respectful, and inclusive community. That means the jerky behavior isn‚Äôt allowed at GDG meetings.

item.title: commit42
item.description: Studio d’innovation web commit42 est sp√©cialis√© dans les technologies React, PHP, NodeJS, Magento et PWA. Nos projets peuvent varier de la maintenance d‚Äôune boutique en ligne √† la r√©alisation d‚Äôapplications m√©tiers sp√©cifiques dont des Web App PWA.

item.title: Comprendre le r√¥le du noyau d'un syst√®me d'exploitation en en cr√©ant un from scratch
item.description: Programmer le noyau d’un syst√®me d’exploitation est un tr√®s bon moyen pour en comprendre le fonctionnement et le scope de son travail (IO, gestion de la m√©moire, etc). Cette pr√©sentation a pour but de pr√©senter et de d√©velopper les composants √©l√©mentaires d’un micro noyau UNIX. Dans ce talk je pr√©senterai: L’√©mulateur QEMU La r√©alisation d’un secteur de boot avec une micro console Comment g√©rer les interruptions hardware (clavier) et software La gestion des appels syst√®mes Un syst√®me multi-process simple qui va permettre de d√©couvrir le surco√ªt des changements de contexte li√©s √† la programmation concurrentielle

item.title: Continental
item.description: Continental develops pioneering technologies and services for sustainable and connected mobility of people and their goods. Founded in 1871, the technology company offers safe, efficient, intelligent, and affordable solutions for vehicles, machines, traffic and transportation. In 2018, Continental generated sales of ‚Ç¨44.4 billion and currently employs around 245,000 people in 60 countries and markets.

item.title: De Java √† un ex√©cutable natif : GraalVM et Quarkus changent la donne
item.description: Les microservices, la scalabilit√© instantan√©e et les plates-formes √† haute densit√© comme Kubernetes n√©cessitent des applications √† faible empreinte m√©moire et d√©marrage rapide. Java n’√©tait pas bien positionn√© car il favorise les temps de traitement aux d√©pens du CPU et de la RAM. Plus maintenant. Entre en sc√®ne Quarkus, une stack Java orient√©e microservices qui supporte vos composants favoris (Hibernate, Vert.x, Camel, RESTEasy …) sur GraalVM et HotSpot avec une faible empreinte m√©moire et un d√©marrage rapide.

item.title: DECASOFT
item.description: Une soci√©t√© √† taille humaine sp√©cialis√©e en d√©veloppement web et mobile implant√©e sur la ville lumi√®re et la ville rose ‚Äì Paris et Toulouse. Nous assurons l‚Äô√©volution professionnelle de nos collaborateurs vers de nouvelles technologies afin de calibrer nos postes selon leurs envies. Pour casser la routine, retrouvez-nous au baby-foot et aux soir√©es afterwork. Nous pouvons par ailleurs vous garantir une ambiance dynamique et 100% conviviale.

item.title: DevOps at scale
item.description: DevOps is everywhere, and every new or existing project is at least considering to follow its principles. While implementing DevOps for single projects become more and more straightforward, it’s still a challenge to have a coherent DevOps approach at Enterprise level. Let’s dig in what it takes to achieve DevOps in large companies, with Airbus as an example.

item.title: Duchess FR
item.description: Find Duchess FR on https://www.duchess-france.org/

item.title: D√©jeuner
item.description: Bon app√©tit

item.title: D√©veloppeurs en reconversion, d√©veloppeurs quand m√™me !
item.description: Ces derni√®res ann√©es, les “fabriques de dev” et autres formations courtes explosent. C’est un fait, tout dev a √©t√© ou sera amen√© √† travailler avec l’un de ces jeunes d√©veloppeurs.euses. Mais qui sont-ils ? Pourquoi une reconversion dans ce genre d’organisation ? Qu’ont-ils appris lors de leur formation express ? C’est fiable ce genre de dev ? Comment puis-je les int√©grer au mieux dans ma structure ? Autant de questions que vous vous √™tes sans doute d√©j√† pos√©es.

item.title: Elastic
item.description: Nous sommes les cr√©ateurs de la suite Elastic: Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats et Logstash. Recherchez, analysez et visualisez vos donn√©es da fa√ßon s√©curis√©e et fiable.

item.title: FAQs
item.description: General What is DevFest Toulouse? The DevFest, or “Developers Festival”, is a technical conference for developers. It is aimed at students, professionals or simply curious technophiles. Throughout the day, renowned speakers will present a variety of topics: around mobile development, the web, data, connected objects, the cloud, DevOps, etc… as well as good development practices. Pauses are used to engage in dialogue and deepen the topics presented. Software development is a very broad subject and our selection committee is committed to providing a varied and interesting program.

item.title: Four Diseases
item.description: How a developer can tell if the system is sick just by taking a look at the input and the output? If you’d like to know that (plus you like standup comedy), come an see! The treatment is safe ;-) One approach to get familiar with a system is a long and intense reading the manual (and to run an eye over the source code sometimes). Another approach is to take a deep dive into the data model (often in the DB) and to surf the user interface.

item.title: GDG Toulouse
item.description: Find GDG Toulouse on https://www.gdgtoulouse.fr/

item.title: GitHub
item.description: GitHub is the developer company. We make it easier for developers to be developers: to work together, to solve challenging problems, and to create the world‚Äôs most important technologies.

item.title: Groupe Pierre Fabre
item.description: Cr√©√© en 1962 par Pierre Fabre, pharmacien d‚Äôofficine √† Castres (Tarn), le Groupe Pierre Fabre est pr√©sent depuis plus de 50 ans sur un continuum d‚Äôactivit√©s allant des m√©dicaments de prescription aux soins dermo-cosm√©tiques en passant par la sant√© grand public. 2√®me laboratoire dermo-cosm√©tique mondial et 2√®me groupe pharmaceutique priv√© fran√ßais, Pierre Fabre emploie pr√®s de 11 000 collaborateurs, d√©tient des filiales dans 47 pays et distribue ses produits dans plus de 130 pays.

item.title: Informatique Banque Populaire
item.description: Informatique Banque Populaire, filiale du groupe bancaire BPCE, assure le d√©veloppement informatique du syst√®me d‚Äôinformation des Banques Populaires.

item.title: Infotel
item.description: Acteur europ√©en de la transformation num√©rique des entreprises, le groupe Infotel est l‚Äôinterlocuteur privil√©gi√© des directions Informatiques et M√©tiers de Grands Comptes depuis pr√®s de 40 ans. Infotel leur apporte son expertise reconnue dans la gestion et l‚Äô√©volution de leur patrimoine informatique mais aussi le conseil aupr√®s des m√©tiers et services innovants int√©grant les technologies digitales ainsi qu‚Äôune expertise Big Data et mobile. Infotel d√©veloppe son savoir-faire dans les secteurs de la Banque, de l‚ÄôAssurance, de la Retraite, de l‚ÄôIndustrie et des Transports en s‚Äôappuyant sur l‚Äôinnovation et la R&D.

item.title: Introduction √† la programmation par contraintes
item.description: Quel est le point commun entre un jeu de sudoku, la planification d’une conf√©rence et les d√©placements d’un commercial ? Quand on souhaite les traiter automatiquement, tous ces probl√®mes peuvent √™tre r√©solus par un solveur de contraintes. Dans ce talk, je vais essayer de vous faire une introduction pratique √† la programmation par contraintes, en pr√©sentant les concepts de base, puis en les mettant en application avec plusieurs exemples de probl√®mes connus de tout le monde (ou presque), pour finir par un cas plus complexe sur lequel je travaille actuellement.

item.title: L'histoire de la d√©couverte d'une backdoor sign√©e OnePlus
item.description: R√©sum√© En Novembre 2017, j’ai d√©couvert “une backdoor” dans tous les t√©l√©phones de la marque OnePlus. √Ä l’aide d’une simple ligne de commande, un attaquant ayant un acc√®s physique au t√©l√©phone, pouvait devenir root et ainsi obtenir un contr√¥le total du t√©l√©phone de la victime. D√©tails Dans ce talk, j’expliquerai le processus qui m’a permis de faire cette d√©couverte : Extraction du build R√©cup√©ration des applications dites “syst√®me” D√©tection de la vuln√©rabilit√© dans l’application Android “EngineeringMode” Exploitation de la vuln√©rabilit√© Sujet abord√©s Lors de la d√©tection et l’analyse de cette faille, nous aborderons la philosophie du hacking, comment faire du reverse engineering sur des applications Android et une librairie native.

item.title: Le burn-out agile
item.description: En 2019, le monde de l‚Äôinformatique n‚Äôa que l‚Äôagilit√© √† la bouche. Ca groome √† tous les coins de rue, √ßa s‚Äôexcite en daily, √ßa colle des post-it et √ßa empile les serious game en r√©tro. Bien s√ªr, √ßa g√®re la transformation num√©rique (d√©sol√©, m√™me au second degr√©, je ne peux pas employer ‚Äúdigitale‚Äù) et au final plus personne ne comprend rien. Des chefs de projet subitement propuls√©s ScrumMaster qui ne savent pas ce qu‚Äôils doivent faire.

item.title: Le design de l'erreur
item.description: Nos syst√®mes sont design√©s de mani√®re optimiste, de la gestion technique des erreurs √† la mod√©lisation de nos interfaces. Que ce soient les codes d’erreurs, les exceptions ou les mod√©lisations plus avanc√©es, elles servent pour arr√™ter un traitement et potentiellement afficher un message d’information √† un utilisateur. Mais avec les architectures microservices, la distribution des traitements ou une simple volont√© de r√©silience, la gestion des erreurs est devenue un enjeu important de tous les syst√®mes afin qu‚Äôils restent accessibles de tous, tout le temps tout en maintenant le syst√®me dans un √©tat coh√©rent.

item.title: Le jaillissement de l'esprit
item.description: Les enfants sont eux-m√™mes les b√¢tisseurs actifs de leurs propres structures intellectuelles et l’informatique y joue un r√¥le d√©terminant, disait Piaget, un c√©l√®bre biologiste, psychologue et logicien. Son collaborateur, Seymour Papert, inventera le langage Logo, langage qui fait qu’aujourd‚Äôhui je suis un d√©veloppeur √©panoui. Qu’en est-il aujourd’hui ? Comment donner le go√ªt du code √† nos enfants et surtout pourquoi est-ce important ? Avec Saskia, Lo√Øs et leur p√®re nous voyagerons √† travers le temps, en partant de la tortue sur ce bon vieux M05 en passant par Scratch, le Logo hipster de nos jours, jusqu‚Äô√† Groovy et Python.

item.title: Le troll dans ta machine --- Une courte introduction √† la pens√©e de Jean-Yves Girard
item.description: Jean-Yves Girard, le g√©nial inventeur des indispensables montres √† moutarde (1990), est certes un joyeux trublion. Mais avant d’en arriver √† ce sommet ind√©passable, il a tout de m√™me publi√© deux-trois petites choses en chemin: Rust, vous connaissez? L’id√©e premi√®re du syst√®me de typage de Rust est la logique dite “lin√©aire”, due √† Jean-Yves Girard (1987). Haskell, √ßa vous dit quelque chose? Les syst√®mes de typage de Haskell mais aussi Scala (et d’une certaine mani√®re Java) sont bas√©s sur le “syst√®me F” (ou lambda-calcul de second ordre), d√ª √†… Jean-Yves Girard (1972).

Pr√©paration, accompagnement, suivi, et plus que tout, protection. Nous mettons l‚Äôintelligence artificielle au service de l‚Äôutilisateur. item.title: Machine learning avec des allumettes et des cotillons

item.title: Modern Forms in React
item.description: If the new React Context API and Suspense killed Redux (they didn’t), surely Hooks kill the need for a form library, right? Well, not exactly. Managing form state is more than just holding your current values in state; it’s about sync and async validition errors, and much more! But that doesn’t mean that Hooks are irrelevant to the situation. Hooks make building forms in React easier than ever before.

item.title: Rust as a High-Level Langage
item.description: The singe most important feature of Rust is memory safety. Writing code with performance of C++, at a typical development cost, and with guaranteed absence of certain classes of memory safety related vulnerabilities is something that was not possible before. However, all popular managed languages with garbage collection take memory safety for granted, so this aspect of Rust doesn’t bring anything new to the table, if you already use Java or Go.

item.title: Rust, WebAssembly, and the future of Serverless
item.description: A lot of things have been said about WebAssembly inside of the browser; after all, that’s why it was originally created. But a new case is emerging as well, and that’s WebAssembly on the server. More specifically, we’re seeing a rise of support for WebAssembly in serverless application platforms, combining two brand-new technologies together. We’re also seeing a lot of growth of the Rust programming language, and its close alignment with WebAssembly.

item.title: The Freedom of Static Typing
item.description: It’s a common idea: Dynamic typing gives you freedom to do whatever you want, but then you suffer mistakes and runtime errors. Static typing limits your freedom, but it leads to fewer bugs, even if it’s harder to actually write code. This isn’t entirely false. Yes, it can be quite hard to write a Rust or Haskell program that compiles, enough that it’s a running gag in their communities. “But once you get it to compile, it’s probably correct!

Dans ce talk on parlera d’Arduino, d’impression 3D, de cartes √† puce, d’√©lectronique et des probl√®mes que j’ai rencontr√©s et comment j’ai pu les r√©soudre.

item.title: WebGPU: Next-generation 3D Graphics on the Web
item.description: This talk will give an overview of the WebGPU API that will provide modern features such as ‚ÄúGPU compute‚Äù on the Web as well as lower overhead access to GPU hardware and better, more predictable performance. This will allow for much more graphically intensive games on the Web and boost performance of frameworks like Tensorflow.js up to 10x.

item.title: WeLoveDevs.com
